org.kiji.schema
Class KijiTablePool.KijiTablePoolBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.schema.KijiTablePool.KijiTablePoolBuilder
Enclosing class:
KijiTablePool
public static final class KijiTablePool.KijiTablePoolBuilder
extends Object

Builder class for KijiTablePool instances. These should be constructed with KijiTablePool.newBuilder(org.kiji.schema.KijiTableFactory) instead.

          Builds the configured KijiTablePool.

withMaxSize

public KijiTablePool.KijiTablePoolBuilder withMaxSize(int maxSize)
Sets the maximum number of connections to keep per table.

Use zero(0) to indicate that the pool should be unbounded.

Parameters:
maxSize - The max number of connections to keep per table.
Returns:
This options object for method chaining.

withIdleTimeout

public KijiTablePool.KijiTablePoolBuilder withIdleTimeout(long timeoutMillis)
Sets the amount of time a connection may be idle before being removed from the pool.

Use zero (0) to indicate that connections should never be removed.

Parameters:
timeoutMillis - Timeout in milliseconds.
Returns:
This options object for method chaining.
